meta.title: Rabbit Hole
meta.description: What is the internet doing to us? The Times tech columnist Kevin Roose discovers what happens when our lives move online.
meta.author: The New York Times
meta.summary: What is the internet doing to us? The Times tech columnist Kevin Roose discovers what happens when our lives move online.

episodes.title: Eight: 'We Go All'
episodes.description: One QAnon believer’s journey through faith and loss — and what becomes of reality as we move online.
episodes.summary: One QAnon believer’s journey through faith and loss — and what becomes of reality as we move online.

episodes.title: Seven: 'Where We Go One'
episodes.description: QAnon believers, united in a battle against what they see as dark forces of the world, reveal where the internet is headed.
episodes.summary: QAnon believers, united in a battle against what they see as dark forces of the world, reveal where the internet is headed.

episodes.title: Six: Impasse
episodes.description: An interview with PewDiePie, as he comes to grips with his influence.
episodes.summary: An interview with PewDiePie, as he comes to grips with his influence.

episodes.title: Five: The Accidental Emperor
episodes.description: How one outsider came to rule the internet — and eventually embody its battle with mainstream culture.
episodes.summary: How one outsider came to rule the internet — and eventually embody its battle with mainstream culture.

episodes.title: Four: Headquarters
episodes.description: A trip to YouTube for a conversation with the woman trying to change it.
episodes.summary: A trip to YouTube for a conversation with the woman trying to change it.

episodes.title: Three: Mirror Image
episodes.description: Five years into a rabbit hole, Caleb goes from one side of the screen to the other.
episodes.summary: Five years into a rabbit hole, Caleb goes from one side of the screen to the other.

episodes.title: Two: Looking Down
episodes.description: “The truth is down there, and you’ve got to go down and dig for it.” We trace Caleb’s descent into YouTube, inch by inch.
episodes.summary: “The truth is down there, and you’ve got to go down and dig for it.” We trace Caleb’s descent into YouTube, inch by inch.

episodes.title: One: Wonderland
episodes.description: A young man finds escape on the internet. He doesn’t realize that on the other side of the screen, a force is pulling him in.
episodes.summary: A young man finds escape on the internet. He doesn’t realize that on the other side of the screen, a force is pulling him in.

episodes.title: START HERE
episodes.description: What is the internet doing to us? The Times tech columnist Kevin Roose discovers what happens when our lives move online.
episodes.summary: What is the internet doing to us?
